mapper.insert: insert into ds_sendorders( cityname,platformid,storeno,storename,username,deptchannelid,deptname,channelname,datanum, year,month,createtime) values( #{cityname},#{platformid},#{storeno},#{storename},#{username}, #{deptchannelid},#{deptname},#{channelname},#{datanum}, YEAR(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)),MONTH(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)),NOW() )
mapper.delete: delete from ds_sendorders where year =#{year} and month =#{month}
mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(datanum),0) as sendordersum,count(*) as totalcount from ( select cityname, IFNULL(platformid,'') as platformid, IFNULL(storeno,'') as storeno, IFNULL(storename,'') as storename, IFNULL(username,'') as username, deptchannelid, IFNULL(deptname,'') as deptname, IFNULL(channelname,'') as channelname, datanum, date_format(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') as createtime from ds_sendorders where year =#{year} and month =#{month} and storeno IN (${storeids})) sendorderChanline
